WorkItem.Description:
When trying to create a new project in VS2010, I select the MvvmLight (WPF4) template, and it gave me an error message about not being able to find ProjectForTemplate.csproj in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\Common7\IDE\ProjectTemplatesCache\CSharp\Windows\Mvvm\MvvmLight.WPF4.zip" .

I changed the name of the file MvvmLight.WPF4.csproj to ProjectForTemplate.csproj and after doing so, I was able to create a project of project type "MvvmLight (WPF4)" in VS2010.

I also tried creating a new project in Microsoft Expression Blend 4. When I have MvvmLight (WPF) or any of the native .Net project type's selected, the UI allows me to hit the "OK" button. However, when I have MvvmLight (WPF4) selected, the "OK" button is disabled.
WorkItem.Summary: Can't New Project of type MvvmLight (WPF4) in VS2010 or Blend4 (Toolkit V3 SP1)
